command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user KrGaEuKwKPW5NAp.root --database mP6FLm6cHUyVdEMNViNuZS --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE `favorites`;

Table	Create Table
favorites	CREATE TABLE `favorites` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `artistId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
